element:
http://www.xulplanet.com/tutorials/xultu/trees.html http://www.xulplanet.com/reference/elemref/ref_treerow.html A single row in a tree. It should be placed inside a treeitem element. Children of the treerow should be treecell elements. If child rows are necessary, they should be placed in a treechildren element inside the parent treeitem.
Sets the properties of the treerow, which can be used to style the row.
